__e: Who did he get the poison from?
You see, we got our poison ivy in the same place.
Tell me, monsieur Colin. The poison - from where did it come?
- The poison? Yeah, that's true, too.
This toxin, it's not lethal, but it will make you wish that it were.
Perhaps the poison is still within you.
You want off this island, you gon' make me that poison.
How would he know which one to serve the poisoned glass to?
But... they are making that poison for us, to destroy us.
It's the same poison she used to kill my master.
After you lie down with me, you go in there, wash your body with this poison, like any whore.
- Come on, Kent, think. This is the same poison that you gave him.
The poison in this wound runs deep.
Look at you, putting all that poison in your hair.
Please, don't let him inject you with that poison.
Said they don't want your poison. Mm.
You think your venom can hurt me?
When can we have some more of your potion?
